labels.label:
NOTES:
Set "events" label to the number of events sent per second to the broker. This value is calculated from the number of concurrent tasks configured at the prometheus-collector's GenerateJSONData processor, multiplied by 10 (the number of timeseries samples generated by the processor).

IMPORTANT:
Remember to enable all the controller services
Split events to make sure they are individually processed by the next processors
Add "Content-Type=application/json" and "mime.type=application/json" as attributes to improve visualization
Merge all records in 1000 rows CSV
Get metric-id from seed label Get collectionTimestamp value
Save timestamps into CSV
Create "notificationTimestamp" attribute with now timestamp

Create "collectionTimestamp" attribute with the info extracted from content
Add "Content-Type=application/json" and "mime.type=application/json" as attributes to improve visualization
Save timestamps into CSV
Create "metric-id" attribute with the ID extracted from content
This could have been done with a Postman query. In any case, this way is more comfortable because you don't have to exit nifi nor finding the ip

To delete subscription
